name: X Protocol
description: The $X Protocol stands as a market maker for $PTGC. X is the cutting edge corner stone of Alien Technology. The $River flows from $X to $PTGC. All numbers have meaning. X ensures to bring new experiences for all who believe in possibilities for the future. All that occurs on the fore front of $X comes with reasoning and sensibility. $X is a token for the people. People who believe in the same principles, who are here for freedom, and for those who don't have expectations from the work of others. X is built on the foundation of Pulsechain, $X launched at the lowest of the lows, enabling it for exponential growth, and infinite capabilities. X is determined to change the mindset and perception of project capabilities on Pulsechain by projecting the belief of a free market through the X ecosystem. X has liquidity amongst both PulseX and 9inch dex, including V3 liquidity. $X provides vast opportunity for Heart's Law due to the rivers that flow between the core ecosystem token $X and $RVRX which connects $X to $PTGC and $RVR which connects $X to $UFO. ALL ACTIONS HAVE PURPOSE.
